name: Euphionia v0.3
description:
(Game is still a work in progress. Bugs and general oversights may exist. Please report any issues to me Here, on the Guilded Server, the Discord Server, or by contacting me at euphioniaofficial@gmail.com[other methods preferred])

Euphionia: Chapter I is a retroidvania, inspired mostly by the 16-bit era.

In Euphionia v.0.3 you'll take control of the reluctant heroine Skolorie, in a semi-open world adventure through Metrania, Fenmia, Mialind, Lindrial and Karymir! The first 5 of 8 regions. 

This version features 13 playable areas, 4 bosses, 4 towns, multiple hidden rooms, collectable items, equipment, upgrades, 2-player mode and more!

NEW SINCE LAST STABLE BUILD:

  • 2 new regions, which include:
    • 5 new playable areas
    • 2 new towns
    • 2 new boss battles
    • Many new challenge rooms and collectables
  • Local 2-Player mode(Still in beta)
  • Equipment
  • Revamped pause menu, features an entirely new UI and includes:
    • Functioning Items menu
    • Functioning Map
    • Functioning Equip menu
    • Place-holder Special Items menu
    • Return to title-screen input
  • Unlockable attack and moveset upgrades
  • General improvements throughout the game and world, including
    • Atmospheric details
    • Slight redesigns in playable areas
    • Graphical and audio polish
      • including better idle animations with audio
      • Better mixing for some songs
      • A new system to handle music and backgrounds
  • Physics tweaks
  • UI updates
  • In-game file deletion
  • Bugfixes
